automation.title: Automation
automation.description: In your daily work tasks, you can sometimes feel that you have too many repetitive and mundane tasks. This is where the improvements we've made this year around automation will help! You can now take advantage of our brand new Rules Builder, as well as other improvements to the Rules Engine.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Data governance is essential to further guarantee the ease of enrichment and the sustainability of your product catalog. That’s why we’ve added a lot of cool features to make our product modeling capabilities even more flexible and powerful. Among other things, you will now be able to enjoy new associations types, a revamped Yes/No attribute, and enhancements around product variants.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Data quality is always a big concern. Spelling mistakes, inconsistencies, and formatting issues are easy to overlook but can negatively impact the product experience. To help you with this tedious task, we've improved our dedicated feature, Data Quality Insights. It has never been easier to monitor, track and correct the quality of your product catalog.

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.description: You know the drill now: `The more your PIM is connected, the more powerful it will be!` With this new release, we keep making the connection between PIM and other platforms and tools always more seamless thanks to new features like our brand new Events API and enhancements on Connections and on our REST API.
